short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Load tab groups from a custom homepage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The first New Tab page to allow users to save entire tab groups.
Simply create tab groups and save them on the new tab page.
Open all the tabs you need for a given task right from your new tab page and with one click. 

It includes a handy search widget which automatically searches using your default browser search engine.

Try out the beta live group feature:
Click the three dots and switch a group to a live group which will constantly update with your current tabs to save even more time. 

Features:
Save Tab Groups you have made to you New Tab page.
Sync New Tab data across chrome browsers.
